findings.title: Consider removing duplicate validations
findings.description: Some validations such as checking for the cap during the token buying process are performed multiple times.

findings.title: Some major and minor issues were found during the audit which can break the desired behaviour
findings.description: Major and minor issues were identified during the audit that can compromise the intended functionality.

findings.title: Consider following the solidity style guide
findings.description: Following Solidity guidelines on formatting code and commenting can improve overall code quality and readability.
